entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
